text: Yinīharū samakṣa sansārakō jindagīkō udāharaṇa pani varṇana garnus (tyō yastō cha) jastai pānī jasalā'ī hāmī ākāśabāṭa varṣāyauṁ ta yasabāṭa pr̥thvīkō vanaspati umrayō phēri ṭuṭaphuṭa bha'ēra ghanā bha'ī paraspara guthihālē tara tyasalā'ī hāvālē uḍā'idincha allāha nai harēka kurōmāthi sāmathryavāna cha
